scenario_text.value:
Dammit! What good comes of partnering up with
human children?

That’s no one’s business but our own.
I partner because that is my choice.
Don’t argue! Just attack!

Cool your jets, Kaito.
I will show you true glory!

Don’t argue! Just attack!
Defeat is not an option!

I said, leave it to me!
I will never betray your trust!

Don’t argue! Just attack!
Don’t give him the advantage!

I told you not to worry! Watch!
I’ll give you the ultimate ending!

Dammit! What good comes of partnering up with
human children?

That’s no one’s business but our own.
I partner because that is my choice.
Less yappy-yap, more smashy-smash!

You don’t have to tell me twice. I’ll make
them regret getting in our way!

Enough talking already! Crush them! Don’t
blame me if we lose here!

There’s no way I can lose. You just stand
there and drink it all in!

Enough with the yappy-yap, just smashy-smash!
Or are you ready to throw in the towel?!

Worried about me, are you, Kaito? I’ll show
you there’s nothing to fear!

Dammit! What good comes of partnering up with
human children?

A shallow perspective, Garurumon. The heart’s
value is not so easily dismissed.
Less yappy-yap, more smashy-smash!
O, my fated child. Entrust this task to me.

Enough talking already! Crush them! Don’t
blame me if we lose here!

Defeat is nigh-impossible. You may wait
without fear.

Enough with the yappy-yap, just smashy-smash!
Or are you ready to throw in the towel?!

Heh... Your concern is touching. Leave this
to me. I shall not fall here.
What are you idiots talking about?
